inclusion.criterion: Native born or residents of Shandong province for at least 5 years.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Previous history of thyroid diseases or medication intake (including iodine supplements)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: protein-energy malnutrition in the long term
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Wilson disease, but no history of thyroid diseases or medication intake mentioned.
